name: Sniper Finish Hard Task Story
description:
Sniper Finish Hard Task Story is counter terror shooting game and frontline epic battle counter terrorist new shooting games . You will be front line army shooter commando and will be armed as a bravo shooter rifleman . Pick the futuristic combat battle war weapons to eliminate terrorist war.
Features:
- first person action shooting game
- Real experience of the war on terror
- realistic game physics and shooting effects
- High quality 3D graphics
- a variety of powerful weapons for your choice
- realistic battlefield environment
- amazing music and sound effects
